Instruction: Rinse quinoa under cold water, then combine with water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes until quinoa is cooked and water is absorbed. Fluff with a fork and let it cool slightly.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, tangerine juice, tangerine zest, chopped fresh basil, diced red bell pepper, sliced green onions, olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Toss all ingredients together until well combined.
Serve the tangerine basil quinoa warm or at room temperature as a flavorful side dish.
